Přihlášení do Informačního systému KNOTI: Logging in the KNOTIS information system
Poskytnuté kontaktní informace (telefon,: Provided contact information (telephone number, e-mail, etc.) will only be used for communication purposes inside the research group about the contracted work and problems related to it. The information will be stored only for the duration of the research in KNOTIS. KNOTIS will automatically delete contact and DPP (employment agreement)/scholarship information within three months after research concludes and when there is no account to be found on the merlin server (termination of studies) – this process is irreversible.
Poskytnuté podklady pro DPP/stipendia (o: DPP/scholarship information will only be used for paying out and will be stored for the necessary duration stated by the financial law. KNOTIS will automatically delete DPP (employment agreement)/scholarship information within three months after research concludes and when there is no account to be found on the merlin server (termination of studies) – this process is irreversible.
Zde si můžete nastavit, do kolika hodin: There you can set up, until when on Monday you will have preselected last week for reporting sheets from the previous week. Maximal value is 24 hours.
Zasílat kopie výkazů e-mailem?: Send copies of timesheets by email?
Stránka, která se zobrazí po přihlášení: Page that will be shown after log in
Jak si přejete hlídat wiki úkoly: How do you want to watch wiki tasks
Číslo bankovního účtu, kde si přejete za: Bank account number where you want money to be send
Uživatel s tímto jménem neexistuje: User with this username does not exist
Aktuální heslo se neshoduje: The current password does not match
Nastala chyba ve změně osobních údajů: There was an error in changing personal data
Nastala chyba ve změně kontaktních údajů: There was an error in changing contact information
Prosím vyplňte všechna povinná pole: Please fill in all required fields
Údaje byly úspěšně změněny: The data has been successfully changed
Jste-li student(ka), povinná položka: Required item, if you are a student
Povinná položka pro DPP - zadejte číslo: Required item for DPP - select ID number or passport number (at least one of them)
Projekt, na kterém byla práce odpracován: The Project, on which the work was done
Nastavit předminulý týden a zvolený proj: Set to two weeks ago and selected project
Nastavit minulý týden a zvolený projekt: Set to last week and selected project
Nastavit současný týden a zvolený projek: Set to current week and selected project
Činnost nesouvisí přímo s projektem: Work isn't directly related to the project
(nemáte-li problémy, ponechte prázdné): (if you do not have any problems, leave blank)
Uložit a odeslat problémy (pokud problém: Save and send problems (if problems prevent the continuation of the work)
Uložit změny v týdenním výkazu (neuloží: Save changes in weekly report (will not save daily report)
Odeslat výkaz (výkaz za tento týden doko: Send timesheet (this week's timesheet will be finished unless you send it till next week's monday, timesheet will be sent automatically)
Změny v týdenním výkazu byly úspěšně ulo: Changes in weekly report were successfully saved
Činnost souvisí přímo s projektem: Work is directly related to the project
